title: How to Make Money from Other People's Recyclables

steps.headline: Choose method of transportation.
steps.description: Walking or biking are preferred. If you are walking, bring a wagon to carry the recyclables home. If you are biking, bring bike baskets and containers to help you hold recyclables.

steps.headline: Know when your neighborhood's recycling day is.
steps.description: You will need to know this. Different areas of your community may have different recycling days, so check ahead.

steps.headline: The evening before the recycling truck comes, go around the neighborhood.
Go around into people's recycle bins.
steps.description: Collect aluminum cans and plastic bottles.

steps.headline: Exchange cans and bottles for money.
steps.description: Some larger food stores have 24/7 machines to collect money for you; if you use them, you can go back for more recyclables on the same day.

text: Choose method of transportation. Walking or biking are preferred. If you are walking, bring a wagon to carry the recyclables home. If you are biking, bring bike baskets and containers to help you hold recyclables. Know when your neighborhood's recycling day is. You will need to know this. Different areas of your community may have different recycling days, so check ahead. The evening before the recycling truck comes, go around the neighborhood.  Go around into people's recycle bins. Collect aluminum cans and plastic bottles. Exchange cans and bottles for money. Some larger food stores have 24/7 machines to collect money for you; if you use them, you can go back for more recyclables on the same day. Enjoy your money!
